panels.description: TCP connections (Incoming) in mongod processes

targets.expr:
topk(5,(max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[5m])))

avg(max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[5m]))

panels.title: Top 5 Connections

targets.expr:
max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongod_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_mongos_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[5m]) or
max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[$interval]) or max_over_time(mongodb_connections{service_name=~"$service_name", state="current"}[5m])

panels.description: Open cursors count

targets.expr:
topk(5,(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"}))

avg(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"})

panels.title: Top 5 Total Cursors

targets.expr:
mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="total"}

panels.description: Open cursors that are in pinned state.

targets.expr:
topk(5,(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"}))

avg(mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"})

panels.title: Pinned Cursors

targets.expr:
mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="pinned"}

panels.description: noTimeout cursors currently open

targets.expr:

mongodb_mongod_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="noTimeout"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="noTimeout"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="noTimeout"}))

mongodb_mongod_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="noTimeout"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="noTimeout"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="noTimeout"})

panels.title: Top 5 noTimeout Cursors

targets.expr:
mongodb_mongod_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="noTimeout"} or
mongodb_mongod_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="noTimeout"} or
mongodb_mongos_metrics_cursor_open{service_name=~"$service_name", state="noTimeout"} or 
mongodb_mongos_cursors{service_name=~"$service_name", state="noTimeout"}

panels.description: Average latency of (other) command operations
panels.title: Top 5 Command Latency

panels.description: Average latency of read operations
panels.title: Top 5 Read Latency

panels.description: Average latency of write operations
panels.title: Top 5 Write Latency

panels.description: Ratio of index entries scanned / number of documents returned

targets.expr:
min(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(state) 
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval])
or
(irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[5m]) / ignoring(state) 
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m]))
)

panels.title: Min Index Scanned Ratio

panels.description: Ratio of number of documents returned / index entries scanned

targets.expr:
max(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(state) 
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval])
or
(irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[5m]) / ignoring(state) 
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m]))
)

panels.title: Max Index Scanned Ratio

panels.description: Ratio of index entries scanned compared divided by sum of index entries scanned plus whole documents scanned.

targets.expr:
min(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval])/ ignoring(state)
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[$interval])
or
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m])/ ignoring(state)
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[5m]))

panels.title: Min  Document Scanned Ratio

targets.expr:
max(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval])/ ignoring(state)
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[$interval])
or
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m])/ ignoring(state)
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[5m]))

topk(5,(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(state) 
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval])
or
(irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[5m]) / ignoring(state) 
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m]))
))

avg(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(state) 
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval])
or
(irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[5m]) / ignoring(state) 
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m]))
)

rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[$interval]) / ignoring(state) 
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval])
or
(irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned"}[5m]) / ignoring(state) 
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m]))

topk(5,(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval])/ ignoring(state)
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[$interval])
or
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m])/ ignoring(state)
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[5m])))

avg(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval])/ ignoring(state)
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[$interval])
or
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m])/ ignoring(state)
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[5m]))

rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[$interval])/ ignoring(state)
rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[$interval])
or
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_document_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="returned"}[5m])/ ignoring(state)
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state="scanned_objects"}[5m])

panels.description: Ratio of index entries scanned compared divided by sum of index entries scanned plus whole documents scanned.

targets.expr:
topk(5,(sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects"}) / ignoring(state)
sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects|scanned"})))

avg(sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects"}) / ignoring(state)
sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects|scanned"}))

panels.title: Top 5 Index Filtering Effectiveness

targets.expr:
sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects"}) / ignoring(state)
sum by (service_name) (mongodb_mongod_metrics_query_executor_total{service_name=~"$service_name", state=~"scanned_objects|scanned"})

sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!="command"}[5m])) + 
sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_repl_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_repl_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_repl_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_repl_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_repl_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_repl_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type!~"(command|query|getmore)"}[5m])) +
sum(rate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_ttl_deleted_documents_total{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_metrics_ttl_deleted_documents_total{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]) or
rate(mongodb_mongos_metrics_ttl_deleted_documents_total{service_name=~"$service_name"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_metrics_ttl_deleted_documents_total{service_name=~"$service_name"}[5m]))

panels.title: Top Queued Operations

panels.description: The average rate of commands performed per second over the selected sample period

targets.expr:
topk(5,sum by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[5m])))

avg(sum by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="command"}[5m])))

rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="update"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="update"}[5m]))

topk(5,(sum by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[5m]))))

avg(sum by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[5m])))

sum by (service_name) (rate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongod_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_mongos_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[5m]) or 
rate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[$interval]) or 
irate(mongodb_op_counters_total{service_name=~"$service_name", type="query"}[5m]))

panels.description: This panel shows the actual number of documents that were affected on average during the given time period. A single *update* command for example could perform updates on hundreds or thousands of documents. If these counters seem high, you might want to check your statements to make sure they are properly operating against the documents that they should.
panels.title: Top 5 Document Delete Operations

panels.description: This shows the number of read and write operations that are waiting due to for a lock. Consistently small values here should not be of concern, but if the values are consistently high the queries causing long lock times should be tracked down and fixed.
panels.title: Top 5 Queued Read Operations

panels.description: This shows the number of read and write operations that are waiting due to for a lock. Consistently small values here should not be of concern, but if the values are consistently high the queries causing long lock times should be tracked down and fixed.
panels.title: Top 5 Queued Write Operations

panels.description: This panel shows the number of assert events per second on average over the given time period. In most cases assertions are trivial, but you would want to check your log files if this counter spikes or is consistently high.
panels.title: Top 5 Assert Msg Events
